itemDescription: Scottish rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Walter Little (birth unknown – death unknown) was a Scottish rugby union and professional rugby league footballer.

response: Scotland: WT Forrest (Hawick), JE Crabbie (Edinburgh Acads), JL Forbes (Watsonians), LM MacLeod (Cambridge University), JS MacDonald (Edinburgh University), Patrick Munro (Oxford Uni), ED Simson (Edinburgh University), Anthony Little (Hawick), AG Cairns (Watsonians), WE Kyle (Hawick), WM Milne (Glasgow Acads), A Ross  (Royal HSFP), WP Scott (West of Scotland) capt., RS Stronach (Glasgow Acads), HN Fletcher (Edinburgh University)

response: * Anthony Little, for Scotland (RU) while at Hawick RFC (RU) 1905 1-cap (signed for Wigan 1905-06)
